channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I’m 15 years older’: My second wife says she will pass my estate onto my sons. What could go wrong?
item.description: “My wife is probably one of the most honest persons I’ve ever known.”

item.title: Generative AI is reshaping South Korea’s webcomics industry
item.description: “My mind is still sharp and my hands work just fine, so I have no interest in getting help from AI to draw or write stories,” says Lee Hyun-se, a lege...

item.title: Bill Cosby lists New York townhouse for $7 million after being sued for defaulting on a loan
item.description: Cosby has quietly listed one of his two New York City townhouses amid an ongoing foreclosure battle over that property and another of his Manhattan ho...

item.title: ‘I am suspicious’: My father died, leaving me $250,000. My brother says it’s all gone. What can I do?
item.description: “My brother and I are named as co-executors in his will.”

item.title: ‘She’s kept him afloat’: I’m 78 and leaving my daughter, 41, my life savings, but her partner doesn’t pay rent. What do I do?
item.description: “He keeps losing jobs and going on unemployment.”

item.title: Globalization isn’t over — but now it’s going to make Americans poorer
item.description: Trump’s tariffs can be effective only if other nations don’t retaliate. That isn’t happening.

item.title: Comau to acquire warehousing automation firm Automha in strategic expansion
item.description: Comau plans to acquire fellow Italian company Automha to expand into the logistics sector. The post Comau to acquire warehousing automation firm Autom...

item.title: Aethir launches AI Unbundled industry alliance for Web3 AI development
item.description: Aethir, a provider of decentralized GPU cloud compute, announced the launch of AI Unbundled, an industry-wide alliance for Web3 AI.

item.title: Anthropic just analyzed 700,000 Claude conversations — and found its AI has a moral code of its own
item.description: Anthropic's groundbreaking study analyzes 700,000 conversations to reveal how AI assistant Claude expresses 3,307 unique values in real-world interact...

item.title: Saronic unveils autonomous vessel and acquires Gulf Craft to boost production
item.description: Saronic has retained the experience workforce of Gulf Craft and expects to prototype and build medium uncrewed surface vessels. The post Saronic unvei...

item.title: Yarbo closes Series B funding to continue yard robot expansion
item.description: Yarbo has raised funding to scale mass production of its multi-purpose yard robot, invest in R&D, and prepare for an IPO. The post Yarbo closes Series...

item.title: New KUKA operating system includes a virtual robot controller
item.description: KUKA said iiQKA.OS2 operating system combines the core of its automation system software with a modern user interface and modular safety. The post New...

item.title: AI is pushing the limits of the physical world

item.title: Watch: Google DeepMind CEO and AI Nobel winner Demis Hassabis on CBS’ ’60 Minutes’
item.description: The segment ended with a meditation on the future: a world where AI tools could transform almost every human endeavor.

item.title: The quest to build islands with ocean currents in the Maldives

item.title: 2027 AGI forecast maps a 24-month sprint to human-level AI
item.description: The newly published AI 2027 scenario offers a detailed 2 to 3-year forecast for the future that includes specific technical milestones.
